name: Align genes against WGS reads (gig-map)
description: Align a deduplicated collection of genes against a collection of short sequence reads.

genes.help: Single file containing all genes to be aligned, in amino acid FASTA format (gzip-compressed).

reads.help: Folder containing the set of FASTQ files to align.

min_coverage.help: Minimum proportion of a gene which must align in order to retain the alignment

min_identity.help: Minimum percent identity of the amino acid alignment required to retain the alignment

max_evalue.help: Maximum E-value threshold used to filter all alignments

aligner.help: Algorithm used for alignment (default: diamond, options: diamond, blast)

max_overlap.help: Any alignment which overlaps a higher-scoring alignment by more than this will be filtered out

query_gencode.help: Genetic code used for conceptual translation of gnvenome sequences

nxf_profile.help: Profile used for resource allocation (standard or testing)
